Package de.matthiasfisch.mysticlight4j.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    POJO for 24-bit RGB colors.
    DeviceInfo
    Information about a device as returned by MysticLightNativeBinding.getDeviceInfo().
    LedInfo
    Information about the LED of a Mystic Light device.
    MysticLightAPI
    This class provides the low-level access to the functions from the Mystic Light SDK.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MysticLightAPIException
    Exception thrown when the call of a Mystic Light API function failed.
